property_title: Luxury Seafront Penthouse on Molos Promenade in Limassol Centre, Limassol
property_description: This luxurious three bedroom seafront penthouse is situated on the top floor of a well established building, directly opposite the Molos promenade in Limassol. Occupying the entire 7th floor, it is the only apartment in the building that has been fully renovated to the highest standards, completed in June 2020. The property offers an internal area of 150㎡ with a smart and spacious layout, featuring a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, an additional full bathroom, and generous living areas that open onto an 8㎡ balcony with uninterrupted sea views. Combining a prime first line location with modern finishes and exceptional privacy, this penthouse presents a rare opportunity for either purchase or long term rental in one of Limassol’s most sought after seafront addresses.

Residents enjoy access to an array of premium facilities, including an Olympic size swimming pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, and a safe kids’ playground, all set within beautifully maintained communal gardens. This property is a perfect blend of style, location, and convenience, ideal as a permanent residence, a luxury holiday retreat, or a high demand rental investment. Live where others vacation, book your viewing today.
